bill_title: exempt ephedrine from the controlled drugs and substances schedule under certain circumstances.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to exempt ephedrine from the controlled drugs and substances schedule under certain circumstances. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 34-20B-19 be amended to read as follows: 34-20B-19. Any material, compound, mixture, or preparation is included in Schedule III which contains any quantity of the following substances having a potential for abuse associated with a stimulant effect on the central nervous system: (1) Benzphetamine; (2) Chlorphentermine; (3) Phendimetrazine; (4) Ephedrine. However, ephedrine is exempt from the provisions of this section if the ephedrine is contained in a dietary supplement that is legally marketed under federal law. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
